steps.note: The blocker is the unknown angle ∠F. Known value is ∠AOF = 40°.
Since AB is the diameter, ∠AOF is an inscribed angle subtending the arc AF. Therefore, ∠F = 90° - ∠AOF.

steps.intention: Calculate the measure of angle F.
Map calculated angle to the closest option.
steps.note: The calculated angle F is 50°, which is not an option. Re-evaluate using the correct geometric property.
